definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: Though it’s not necessary, going out of town could be helpful.
sentences.chinese: 儘管非必要，出城還是有一定幫助的。

sentences.english: Have you reduced your spending on some unnecessary expenses?
sentences.chinese: 你是否減少在非必要開銷的支出？

sentences.english: Avoid visiting crowded areas and medical institutions unless it is necessary.
sentences.chinese: 如非必要，避免到人多擠迫的地方及醫療機構。

sentences.english: Please do not disassemble the board at the right side unnecessarily, for the sake of safety.
sentences.chinese: 非必要時請勿拆開右側之差板以策安全。

sentences.english: Britain, the US and France are all advising against non-essential travel to Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 英國，美國和法國都建議非必要情況不要到埃及旅行。

sentences.english: Establish a “waiting period” before any nonessential purchase.
sentences.chinese: 對於任何非必要的購買建立一個“等待期”。
